target_audience: Women, 25-55, interested in traditional Indian jewelry and fashion
color_scheme: Gold, pink, beige, warm tones, elegant
composition: Product-focused, showcasing various bangle and kada designs on models' hands
marketing_objective: Conversion (driving sales through offers and exchange programs)
special_elements: Price discount (40% off), exchange offer (100% exchange on old gold), free gift offer, mention of 'Super Savings July'
